text: Man Against Machine is the tenth studio album by Garth Brooks. The album was released on November 11, 2014. It was Brooks' second studio album on his new label Pearl Records. It was his first studio album new material in nine years. Two of the singles, "People Loving People," and "Send 'Em on Down the Road" were released early and made available digitally on Brooks' official website and GhostTunes.com. ==References== ==Other websites== * Garth Brooks official website Category:2014 albums Category:Garth Brooks albums
title: Man Against Machine
